about_the_game:
Welcome to Upheaveal! In the far reaches of space, Every 6 galactic cycles an intergalactic council known as the Big Omnipotent Intergalactic Society (B.O.I.S) hold the Upheaveal games to crown their next leader. This year, the B.O.I.S have set their sights on Earth. Using the technology of this year's sponsor, Trans-temporal Solutions, they do battle in a variety of different places throughout Earth's history. Play as one of several representatives of alien races each one participating in a test of strength and skill to become the leader of the senate and bring glory and honor to their home planet. Use a variety of different objects in your environment to KO your opponents. Aim to be the last one standing in this physics-based 3D multiplayer party game! Join the Upheaveal Games, become Champion, and mark your rule across the galaxy!

Features:


[Content listed below is currently applicable to the demo version of Upheaveal; more features to be announced at a later date.]

- Play as one of several alien representatives, each with their own unique personality

- Throw a large variety of objects; over 50 unique props to throw, each with its own weight and size

- Battle your friends in an up to 4-player local multiplayer battles

- Cause Upheaveal in several unique stages, each representing a different time period and location on Earth, each having a variety of hazards
